Literature.Title: Biosynthesis of Ilamycins Featuring Unusual Building Blocks and Engineered Production of Enhanced Anti-Tuberculosis Agents
Literature.Author: Ma J, Huang H, Xie Y, Liu Z, Zhao J, Zhang C, Jia Y, Zhang Y, Zhang H, Zhang T, Ju J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human hepatocyte cells HL-7702 (L02):IC50=>50 µM,Human umbilical vein endothelial cells HUVEC:IC50=>50 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>121.0µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>121.0µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>121.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>121.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=>121.0µM),Micrococcus luteus SC-1(MIC=>121.0µM),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MIC=30.3µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=1.2µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=>50µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(IC50=>50µM),Human nasopharyngeal carcinoma CNE2(IC50=>50µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=>50µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(IC50=>50µM)
